title: Public UI icon refresh (Heroicons), mobile typography tweaks, and Bottom CTA bar/menu polish

requirements.text: Replace all PUBLIC-facing icons currently implemented with `lucide-react` and `react-icons` with Heroicons (from `@heroicons/react`) across the public site, without modifying any /admin UI or behavior.

quotes: Saya mau Rubah semua icon menggunakan Heroicons... Jangan merubah tampilan admin panel.

acceptanceCriteria: All public pages and shared public components use Heroicons instead of `lucide-react` and `react-icons` (e.g., Navbar, Footer, SectionTitle, Bottom CTA Bar, Home sections, and other public pages listed in feature_evidence.json).
No public routing, data wiring, or functionality changes occur; only icon components are swapped.
Build succeeds with Heroicons installed and no remaining imports from `lucide-react`/`react-icons` in public components.

requirements.text: Reduce oversized title text on mobile for PUBLIC pages by adjusting mobile typography in shared public title components and hero titles, while preserving the existing desktop/tablet styling and not changing any admin UI.

quotes: judul text pada mobile view terlalu besar

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/public/SectionTitle.tsx` uses smaller heading sizing on mobile (e.g., mobile < current `text-3xl`) while keeping equal or near-current sizing on md+ breakpoints.
`frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` mobile title sizing is reduced to be visually balanced (current `text-3xl`), while md+ remains strong/heroic.
No layout structure changes are introduced beyond typography scaling (no reflow-heavy redesign).

requirements.text: Remove the Main Banner Slide (homepage banner carousel/slider) from the public Home page without affecting the remaining Home page sections or CMS-driven data wiring.

quotes: hapus Main Banner Slide di halaman utama

acceptanceCriteria: The carousel/banner slider section is no longer rendered on `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`.
Featured vehicles, CTA banner image section, About section, Search section, and Latest blog section remain present and functional.
No backend changes are required; no CMS data model changes are introduced.

requirements.text: Update the mobile Bottom CTA Bar to be 50px tall with sharp/square corners (no rounded top corners), keeping the same four actions and color blocks, and without impacting any admin UI.

quotes: ubah tinggi Bottom CTA bar menjadi 50px dengan sudut siku atau kotak

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/navigation/BottomCtaBar.tsx` renders at exactly 50px height on mobile (replacing current `h-16`).
Bottom bar container and button corners are square (remove rounded top corners currently applied).
All four actions remain: Call, WhatsApp, Credit Simulation, Main Menu; existing colors remain (#C90010, #398E3D, #FEA500, #0166C0).
Tap targets remain usable at 50px height (icons/text scaled appropriately without truncation).

requirements.text: Reposition and restyle the Bottom CTA Bar 'Main Menu' dropdown so it appears directly above the blue 'Main Menu' box, and polish the visual styling of all PUBLIC dropdown/sheet menus to look cleaner and more minimalâ€”without changing any admin panel UI.

quotes: Menu dropdown pada Bottom cta bar letakkan tepat diatas kotak biru. Perbaiki tampilan semua menu dropdown agar lebih cantik dan estetik. Jangan merubah tampilan admin panel.

acceptanceCriteria: When the user taps the blue 'Main Menu' action in the Bottom CTA Bar, the menu panel opens positioned directly above the blue box (aligned horizontally with that button), not as a generic full-width bottom sheet.
The menu dropdown closes on outside tap and on navigation item click, and animations/transitions remain smooth.

Public dropdown/sheet menus (e.g., Bottom CTA menu and Navbar mobile sheet) receive visual polish (spacing, typography, dividers, hover/active states) while keeping existing navigation items and behaviors unchanged.
No `/admin` components, routes, or styles are modified.

constraints: Do not modify any admin panel UI, routes, components, or behavior (`frontend/src/admin/**`).
Do not change public routes, CMS wiring, or backend APIs; this request is UI-only on public pages.
Do not redesign parts of the public UI that already look good; limit changes to icons, mobile title sizing, homepage banner removal, Bottom CTA bar dimensions/corners, and dropdown/menu aesthetics.
Respect immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; do not edit them.
nonGoals: Translating or changing existing public text content (only adjust typography sizing where required).
Any backend changes (Motoko) or data/schema migrations.
Adding new homepage sections or changing the order/content of existing sections besides removing the main banner slider.
Changing CTA actions, WhatsApp/phone targets, or navigation destinations.

preferencesToAdd: Prefer Heroicons for all public-facing icons.
Prefer minimalist, square-corner Bottom CTA bar at 50px height with a dropdown aligned above the Main Menu button.
Prefer smaller mobile title typography on public pages.
